hints.content:
The denominator in $\dfrac{7}{8}$ is $8$. 

So, there should be $8$ equal parts in each whole.



[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line that has, moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, seven unlabeled tick marks, a tick mark labeled 1, seven unlabeled tick marks, and an ending tick mark at 2. Eight equal rectangles labeled one-eighth are above the number line between the tick mark at 0 and the tick mark at 1. !

hints.content:
The numerator in $\dfrac{7}{8}$ is $7$. 

So, we need to move $\dfrac18$ on the number line $\blueD7$ times to reach the point.



[[☃ image 1]]

Which number line shows a point located at $\dfrac{7}{8}$?

options.alt: A number line that has, moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, six unlabeled tick marks, a tick mark labeled seven-eighths, a tick mark labeled 1, seven unlabeled tick marks, and an ending tick mark at 2. There is a blue dot at the seventh tick mark after 0. Eight equal rectangles labeled one-eighth are above the number line between the tick mark at 0 and the tick mark at 1. The first seven rectangles from the left are shaded. An arrow points to the right along the number line from the tick mark at 0 to the tick mark at seven-eighths. !

hints.content:
Number line $\maroonD{B}$ shows a point located is at $\dfrac78.$


[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line that has, moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, seven unlabeled tick marks, a tick mark labeled 1, seven unlabeled tick marks, and an ending tick mark at 2. There is a pink dot at the seventh tick mark after 0. !

question.content:
**Which point is at $\dfrac{7}{​8}$ on the number line?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: $\greenD{A}$ ![A number line that has, moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, three unlabeled tick marks, a tick mark labeled 1, three unlabeled tick marks, and an ending tick mark at 2. There is a green dot at the third tick mark after 1.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8c401932ce8e141d84df2f7501734061962e7a83)

$\maroonD{B}$ ![A number line that has, moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, seven unlabeled tick marks, a tick mark labeled 1, seven unlabeled tick marks, and an ending tick mark at 2. There is a pink dot at the seventh tick mark after 0.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/b3158a86ddf5bdd152cce8f99c27137db1975741)

$\blueD{C}$ ![A number line that has, moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, five unlabeled tick marks, a tick mark labeled 1, five unlabeled tick marks, and an ending tick mark at 2. There is a blue dot at the first tick mark after 1.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/f608de8a3d0194f2123b329cf4e37c2e262453bb)
